name: Golden Patient 4 - Chronic Kidney Disease Patient
remarks: James Thompson - 35M comprehensive CKD progression test patient
NEPHROLOGY FOCUS: Diabetic nephropathy, progressive CKD (Stage 3→4→5), dialysis preparation
LABS: 9 Renal panels (Creatinine, eGFR, BUN), 9 CMPs, 9 CBCs, 4 PTH, 2 Kt/V dialysis adequacy
IMAGING: 2 Renal ultrasounds, 2 Fistula ultrasounds, 2 Chest X-rays, 1 Echocardiogram, 1 CT
PROCEDURES: AV fistula creation, Dialysis catheter placement, 3 Hemodialysis sessions, 2 Nephrology consults
MEDICATIONS: 12+ orders (Insulin, Amlodipine, EPO, Sevelamer, Calcitriol, Sodium bicarbonate)
CARE PLANS: 3 comprehensive (CKD management, Dialysis preparation, Chronic hemodialysis)
ENCOUNTERS: 9 encounters over 12 months (diagnosis, 6 follow-ups, surgery, dialysis initiation)
Trend testing: Creatinine 2.1→6.2, eGFR 38→9, Hemoglobin 10.2→8.5→10.5, Potassium 5.4→6.1→4.2
Stage progression: CKD Stage 3b → Stage 4 → Stage 5 → Hemodialysis
SUFFICIENT data for: 'recent creatinine', 'GFR trend', 'dialysis access', 'CKD stage', 'potassium values'
